member.name: T:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1
member.summary: Standard subject exposing a method to handle the subscription errors if thrown

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.OnCompleted
member.summary: Notifies all subscribed observers about the end of the sequence.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.OnError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Notifies all subscribed observers with the exception.
member.param: The exception to send to all subscribed observers.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.OnNext(`0)
member.summary: Notifies all subscribed observers with the value.
member.param: The value to send to all subscribed observers.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.OnNext(`0,System.Func{System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Notifies all subscribed observers with the value.
member.param: The value to send to all subscribed observers.
Handler for exceptions, return true to continue with next subscriber, false to stop processing.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.Subscribe(System.IObserver{`0})
member.summary: Subscribes an observer to the subject.
member.param: Observer to subscribe to the subject.
member.remarks: IDisposable object that can be used to unsubscribe the observer from the subject.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Eventing.ExceptionHandlingSubject`1.Dispose
member.summary: Unsubscribe all observers and release resources.
